response.overview: If you love hot sexy Android Women obeying your every command, then you have come to the right world. For the first time Technosexuals, ASFR (Alt.Sex.Fetish.Robots), and Robot Fetishists alike now have a movie series that caters to their specific technological sexual proclivity.  Series 3: Unsatisfied with the current HRX project Dr. Ashley Fires has started her own experimental Fembot division. Creating her own HRX, the Ashley 3000 is far more advanced than any of the past HRXs. Concerned with the purpose of the creation of the HRX-S line and the treatment of the Fembots Dr. Fires felt compelled to build her own excogitation without corporate or government interference. She always loved her work and had a vision of a world where robots interacted with humans sexually.
response.title: SciFi DreamGirls 3: The Breakout
